Here is my first attempt at custom sights.

All 4 versions of is is in the zip file,
labeled mimi_ followed by small_ or big_ and designated spot R = right and L= left

Please leave a request or just a comment and tell me how i did below ( :

Gooner-sight of some character I do not know in a hornet outfit. (original artwork by Fukau (Fukou? Fukau? idk man but the watermark is right there))

God damn I despised making the hair and eyes on this one. Liberties were taken because it just looked horrible if I tried doing a one to one recreation.

Did another one for y'all!

Feeling uneasy? Enemies have something to show you? PROTEST to them by using this SIGHT,and show them the real proofs what you are made of!

#wtdraw #memes #PhoenixWright #aceattorney
#Daebom #t34_85 #t34 #anime

Hello,dear WT community!
I am actually an friend that requested the other author to create an AA (Ace Attorney) inspired sight (you literally could see his work,down below)
Please!
Don't tell me I am a copy-cat,it was just an fun challenge and now it turned into something interesting for me and maybe passionate.

You still could find the differences between the images we did,so yeah.
It's actually my first time trying to do an image "tracing" & drawing,but I am welcome to any criticism

Least I could do is just do something like this in free-time and make people crack even...

#wtdraw
#mon3tr
#anime

I'm back after I don't know how long and I've been back for I don't know how long.
